title: Feed and rations for backgrounding Nov 2020

tasks.task: Visit about feed rations for backgrounding cattle
subtasks: Discuss new calf crops and their varying sizes and characteristics
Explain traditional differences between backgrounding and stocker cattle
Analyze historic and current feedstuff prices (corn, distillers grains, hay, wheat mids, canola meal)
Discuss co-product feeds availability in North Dakota (distillers grains, wheat middlings, corn gluten feed, etc.)
Calculate cost per pound of nutrients (energy and protein) in different feed options
Address feed issues like corn silage quality due to early frost and considerations when feeding moldy dry beans
Present various cattle feeding rations and their respective costs per pound of gain
Explain factors affecting rates of gain and management practices for backgrounding cattle
Highlight importance of feed bunk management, vaccinations, and antibiotic use in cattle health
Discuss use of feed additives and implants to improve feed efficiency and prevent coccidiosis.
